title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.2 - Form of cops sale
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.2 - Form of cops sale

State Regulations

The State Comptroller may, pursuant to subdivision 1 of
section
66-b
of the

State Finance Law, cause COPS to be sold either through a request for
proposals, competitive bidding or negotiated placement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
107.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
